column1: 1053|10.53 hrs|He begins to make a record of our observations."10.53 hrs
column2:
he writes, as we crouch at the top of the stairs, listening to his mother in the hall below.
1053|10:53|I gaze and gaze again at that face, which seems to me both strange and familiar, said Austerlitz, I run the tape back repeatedly, looking at the time indicator in the top left-hand corner of the screen, where the figures covering part of her forehead show the minutes and seconds, from 10:53 to 10:57, while the hundredths of a second flash by so fast that you cannot read and capture them.
